Generation V.Black: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
Generation V.White: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
Generation V.Black 2: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.
Generation V.White 2: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.

Generation VI.X: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
Generation VI.Y: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Swadloon lives quietly at the feet of trees. It prefers eating fallen leaves that have grown soft rather than fresh ones.
Generation IX.Violet: Swadloon wraps itself in leaves for protection. It uses the two leaves atop its head to detect air movements and feel out its surroundings.

Generation V.Black: Route 6 , Lostlorn Forest Pinwheel Forest (inner) ( dark grass )
Generation V.White: Route 6 , Lostlorn Forest Pinwheel Forest (inner) ( dark grass )
